tool.name: shared phylotypes
tool.description: Compute shared OTUs between all pairs of samples
tool.command: uncompress_tgz.py -i $otu_table_fp -o shared_phylotypes_input; shared_phylotypes.py -i shared_phylotypes_input -o $output_fp #if str($reference_sample): -r $reference_sample #end if

param.label: -i/--otu_table_fp: path to the input OTU table in biom format or a directory containing OTU tables
param.name: otu_table_fp

param.label: -r/--reference_sample: Name of reference sample to which all pairs of samples should be compared [default: None]
param.name: reference_sample

tool.help: This script computes from an OTU table a matrix with the number of shared phylotypes between all pairs of samples.
